column2: Pssst! Hey! I'm Bumzot. I've heard you're new here and are looking-for some company
You're at the right place then. Do me a small favour and I'll-introduce you your new best friends!
I'm hosting this party tonight and uh... I need some 'grass'-to raise the bar 'high' if you get what I mean
I've been secretly growing them around the campus.-Find and bring me 10 pieces of grass.
And hey! Don't try to be a smartass and try to-complain to the security.
